Bitcoin could go up to a million and down to 1 dollar. This still holds true. It's not a $ BTC trend relationship...its a liquidity and denomination truth

Yes you could, but you would still need to compare vs the $ BTC if the alt is only liquid in $ BTC While Bitcoin trends down post reversal, and you are making a good USD play but its bad in BTC terms...you have less USD when you switch to BTC for withdrawal sake.

The only way to effectively increase your USD returns is through more $ BTC...not because Bitcoin is rising in value, but because its the only off ramp. Trend reversal wouldn't change this. Account denomination changes or more USD markets would change this
